author: henning
msg: A Bug fix.
This one should fix people complaining about that the layout template
has a different context from the screens. We do not create a new
context but pull the existing one from the TemplateInfo.

author: henning
msg: Factor out some common code which seemed to be orphaned in the Screen
and Navigation base classes.

author: henning
msg: A Bug Fix.
Move the refresh of the global tools from the handleRequest invocation
time to getContext. Up until now, global tools were refreshed at least
twice for each request, because in a templated page, the layout
template and the screen template are executed. Now if you have
navigation pages, you can get four or five refreshs per request.
Noone ever actually noticed this which makes a clear statement about
the usage of refreshed global tools. :-)
Now the global tools are refreshed right when the context object is
requested from the Velocity Service, which happens at the begin
of each request cycle.
